edu.berkeley.atdp.java.game.character
Class NPC

java.lang.Object
  edu.berkeley.atdp.java.game.character.NPC
Direct Known Subclasses:
Ball, PC
public abstract class NPC
extends java.lang.Object

Abstract class defining a nonplayable character.

Author:
Jonathan Berney

Constant Field Values

prevPosition

protected double[] prevPosition

position

protected double[] position
The character's position. The element at index 0 is the x component, and the element at index 1 is the y component.

velocity

protected double[] velocity
The character's velocity. The element at index 0 is the x component, and the element at index 1 is the y component.

update

public void update(long elapsedTime,
                   GameObject game)
Updates the state of the character based on a change in time, the dimensions of the gamespace, and the GameObject containing the character.

Parameters:
elapsedTime - Time since last update.
game - The GameObject containing the character.

draw

public abstract void draw(java.awt.Graphics g,
                          int width,
                          int height)
Draws the character onto the GameObject's GamePanel.

Parameters:
g - The Graphics object with which to draw.
width - Width of the gamespace.
height - Height of the gamespace.
